data.title: Anna maria perez de tagle
data.meta_description: In December 2018, she played the role of Lainey in an episode titled Bug a Boo of the fantasy drama television series, Charmed.Anna Maria was born and raised in California, and she comes from a...
data.text:
In December 2018, she played the role of Lainey in an episode titled Bug a Boo of the fantasy drama television series, Charmed.Anna Maria was born and raised in California, and she comes from a family that is no strange to the entertainment industry.She co-starred as Joy Moy in the 2009 musical drama film, Fame, which is a loose remake of the 1980 film of the same name.She holds the distinction of being the first actress to have won the Rising Star Award, which she won at the 1st Filipino American Visionary Awards.Jude Children’s Research Hospital, Children’s Hospital of Los Angeles, and the American Diabetes Association. She has done social activism work for St.She also enjoys reading and playing piano in her free time.

In her leisure time, she enjoys going out snow skiing.She has served as a spokesperson for the talent hunt competition, Elle Girl Model Search.She intends to launch her own range of fashion wear in the future. She loves fashion and enjoys designing clothes in her free time.Source – Anna Maria Perez de Tagle at the East West Players 50th Anniversary Visionary Awards Dinner in April 2016 Anna Maria Perez de Tagle Facts Filipino TV Shows – Kapitan Boom, Prinsesa ng Banyera, and Lobo (January 2008 – July 2008).Role Models – Reese Witherspoon and Lea Salonga.Food – Adobo, Lumpia, Crispy pata and Filipino style sweet spaghetti.Anna Maria Perez de Tagle Favorite Things First TV Showįrom 2006 to 2011, Anna played Ashley Dewitt in 16 episodes of Hannah Montana. In 2005, Anna Maria made her first film appearance in the drama movie, Bee Season. She has served as an opening act for the Jonas Brothers Asia 2012 tour. In 2010, she released her debut single, Roses. Playing the role of Ella Pador in the Disney Original films, Camp Rock (2008) and Camp Rock 2 (2010).Īnna contributed Part of Your World single to the compilation album, Disneymania 7, which was released in March 2010.Being cast as Ashley Dewitt in the musical comedy series, Hannah Montana.The other clothing brands she has done modeling for include Levi’s, Gap, and Mervyn’s. In June 2021, Anna revealed through a TikTok video that she had given birth to a baby girl.Īnna Maria Perez de Tagle and Ivan Dorschner at Belgium Waffle Haus Latte Art Competition in May 2015 Race / EthnicityĦ (US) or 38 (EU) or 12 (UK) Anna Maria Perez de Tagle at the 3rd Annual Unlikely Heroes Awards Dinner and Gala in November 2014 Shoe SizeĪnna Maria has starred in TV commercials for In December 2020, the couple announced their first pregnancy.

Actress Uzo Aduba was the maid of honor at their wedding.
